title: Russia will be converted (American leaflet, ca. 1950)
Title: Russia will be converted. Blue Army of Our Lady – Against the Red Army of Communism!
Publisher: Blue Army of Our Lady of Fátima
Additional information: Anti-communist leaflet published by the Blue Army of Our Lady of Fátima. The Blue Army was founded in the US in 1947 as a Catholic organisation devoted to spreading the message of Our Lady of Fátima, a title of Mary’s associated with the Marian apparitions reported in Portugal in 1917 near the city of Fátima.
